# indexDidUpdateNotification

**Type Property**

The notification the delegate posts after Spotlight updates the index.

## Declaration

```swift
static let indexDidUpdateNotification: Notification.Name
```

## Discussion

The notification’s `userInfo` dictionary contains the keys [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSStoreUUIDKey] and [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentHistoryTokenKey].

## Updating the Index

- **searchableIndex(_:reindexAllSearchableItemsWithAcknowledgementHandler:)**: Reindexes all searchable items and clears any local state.
- **searchableIndex(_:reindexSearchableItemsWithIdentifiers:acknowledgementHandler:)**: Reindexes the searchable items for the specified identifiers.
